name: Jskonamicode
tagline: A jQuery plugin to use the Konami Code
body:
### jQuery Konami Code.
Many old school Konami videogames used the next secuence to cheat on the game, like start with 30 lives in Contra:

Up, Up, Down, Down, Left, Right, Left, Right, B, A

Today, some websites use it to do something special. You can see some of them in [Konami Code Sites](http://konamicodesites.com/) and with this jQuery plugin you can easily do your own.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
